div.p: Von Peukestes: Niemand darf weitergehen. Es ist die Kammer eines Priesters. translated by Johannes Kern as part of the Papyrology course at WÃ¼rzburg (taught by Birgit Breuer, WS 2021/22)
Of Peukestes No one is to pass. The chamber is that of a priest. Translation: E.G. Turner, JEA 60, 1974, S. 240
